name: idealization
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of thinking of or representing someone or something as better than that person or thing really is: An idealization of nature characterized the artist’s work. He pokes fun at society's idealization of women. See
idealize
More examplesFewer examplesHer characters go from idealization to disillusion, but they never become cynical.The show is an idealization of America rooted in small businesses that magically sustain themselves.It is my hope that we continue to evolve our understanding and idealization of beauty.
